Social And Cultural Activities: Associated with organisations for prevention of AIDS, drug addiction and those helping the handicapped and the mentally retarded
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Acted in more than 150 films and 30 plays; and received ‘Yash Bharti’ honour from the Government of Uttar Pradesh
Educational Qualifications: Graduate in Theatre Educated at National School of Drama, New Delhi
